public JettyConnection(JettyServer connector,
                       InetAddress remoteAddress,
                       InputStream in,

                       Object connection)
Constructor.

Parameters:
connector - The parent Jetty connector.
remoteAddress - The address of the remote end or null.
in - Input stream to read the request from.
out - Output stream to write the response to.
connection - The underlying connection object.
